column5: I have recently got into steel head fishing. My dad never fished it but I went once and I like it. I want to go tomorrow but not sure where to go and what to do. I know the basics but not much about steelhead. If anyone is willing to meet somewhere to go pm me with your cell and i give you a call. Thanks
How'd you do? Any fish?  Graham Bristow  A Perfect Drift Guide Company
So Alex Did you get out for some Steelheads? I'm surprised your dad never fished them.
